author: Casey Newton
title: What Zoom doesn’t understand about the Zoom backlash
description: It’s sold like an enterprise app, but it sure doesn’t act like one. It’s time Zoom recognized that its video chat app is more of a consumer tool than it’s willing to admit
content:
Its sold like an enterprise app, but it sure doesnt act like one
